alert.note: Alert for Alexander (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 8:46AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Alexander, northwestern Carlisle, southwestern Ballard and northeastern Mississippi Counties through 915 AM CDT... At 845 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wickliffe, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cairo, Bardwell, Wickliffe, Wyatt and Blandville. This includes Interstate 57 in Missouri near Mile Marker 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
